questions.question: Set on a winter island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' conflict with a corrupt royal family and a rebel army. What is...?

This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Kid Pirates, is known for his metal manipulation powers and rivalry with Luffy. Who is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, known for their skeletal appearance and musical talents, is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. Who is...?
